CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Files.​File
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​IDObjects.​Base
public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Files.​File
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Files.​ImageFile

A class containing information about a file.

Functions
File
public File (
Path newFileName,
FileType newType,
DateTime newLastModified
)
Properties
FileName
public Path FileName { get }

The file name as a Path.

Type
public FileType Type { get }

The FileType.

LastModified
public DateTime LastModified { get; set }

The timestamp of when the file was last modified.

InBinaryFile
public bool InBinaryFile { get; set }

Whether this file is defined in Files.nd.

InFileSource
public bool InFileSource { get; set }

Whether this file was found in one of Engine.Files.Manager's file sources.

Status
public FileFlags Status { get; set }

The file's status.  Will be FileFlags.Unchanged, FileFlags.NewOrChanged, or FileFlags.Deleted.

Claimed
public bool Claimed { get; set }

Whether the file is currently claimed.

StatusSinceClaimed
public FileFlags StatusSinceClaimed { get; set }

The file's status since it was claimed.  Will be FileFlags.UnchangedSinceClaimed, FileFlags.NewOrChangedSinceClaimed, or FileFlags.DeletedSinceClaimed.  This value is undefined when Claimed is false.

Name
public override string Name { get }

The name of the object, which is the same as FileName.

Variables
fileName
protected Path fileName

The absolute Path to the current file.

type
protected FileType type

The FileType.

lastModified
protected DateTime lastModified

The timestamp of when the file was last modified.

flags
protected FileFlags flags

Informational flags about the file.
